0335d7.description:
[Military]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to 3 attacks within 5 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 3. You can count through water, rival spaces, barbarians, and city-states.

+1 to Combat Value
0335d7.name: Flight

057419.description:
[Economy]

Move each of your caravans up to 4 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Your caravans can move into barbarians' spaces. If you move a caravan into a barbarian's space, defeat that barbarian without gaining a trade token.

+1 Space of Movement Each
057419.name: Currency

07a146.description: When defending or when attacking a target other than Carthage, increase your combat value by 1 for each city-state token and friendly city within 2 spaces of the defending space.
07a146.name: Carthage

08991c.description:
[Science]

Advance your tech dial a number of spaces equals to this slot's number.

Advancing your tech dial allows you to replace the cards in your focus row with better versions that have special effects.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
08991c.name: Astrology

08d757.description:
[Economy]

Move each of your caravans up to 3 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Caravans travel to city-states and rival cities to gain trade tokens and diplomacy cards. Trade tokens increase a focus card's effect as descrived at the bottom of that card.

+1 Space of Movement Each
08d757.name: Foreign Trade

0a7aea.description:
Hojo Tokimune

[Divine Wind]

During your turn, desert and mountain spaces that are adjacent to water or the edge of the map are treated as having a terrain difficulty of 3.

Setup:
1. Pottery.
2. Foreign Trade.
3. Masonry.
4. Astrology.
5. Early Empire.
0a7aea.name: Japan

0a939d.description: When attacking, increase your combat value by 2 unless you are attacking the orange player.
0a939d.name: Joint War

0ad9ae.description:
[Economy]

Move each of your caravans up to 6 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower, as well as water.

Then, you may exchange 1 of your resource tokens with another resource token of any type from the supply.

+1 Space of Movement Each
0ad9ae.name: Steam Power

0c21c4.description: At the start of your turn, you may move 1 barbarian to an adjacent, empty space.
0c21c4.name: Seoul

0cf99c.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, you may move 1 of your control tokens to an adjacent, non-water space that is empty (does not contain a token or plasctic figure).

+1 Control Token
0cf99c.name: Drama and Poetry

123ad7.description:
[Industry]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 3 spaces of a friendly space.

Or, build 1 city on an empty space of this slot's terrain or lower that is adjacent to a friendly caravan.

+1 Production for Wonders
123ad7.name: Animal Husbandry

127708.description:
Catherine de Medici

[Grand Tour]

When resolving your culture focus card, place additional control tokens based on your latest-era world wonder:
 - Ancient: 1 token
 - Medieval: 2 tokens
 - Modern: 3 tokens

Setup:
1. Masonry.
2. Astrology.
3. Foreign Trade.
4. Pottery.
5. Early Empire.
127708.name: France

13573d.description:
[Science]

Gain 1 resource of your choice from the supply. You cannot gain a resource of a type that you already have.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
13573d.name: Replaceable Parts

13acc2.description: When defending, increase your combat value by 2 unless the blue player is attacking.
13acc2.name: Defensive Pact

1420f8.description: The blue player's control tokens contribute toward your cities' maturity.
1420f8.name: Open Borders

16a874.description:
[Industry]

Build 1 world wonder. You production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal scpace of this slot's terrain or lower within 2 spaces of a friendly space.

World wonders grand powerful, unique effects to their owners. Cities expand a player's reach into new areas of the map and increase the number of world wonders he or she can have.

+1 Production for Wonders
16a874.name: Pottery

178f60.description:
[Science]

Place 1 trade token from the supply on 1 of your focus cards.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
178f60.name: Mathematics

1d5fe6.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

When defending, increase your combat value by 2.

Barbarians cannot move into spaces containing your cities or reinforced control tokens.
1d5fe6.name: Petra

1d9e37.description:
[Science]

Advance your tech dial a number of spaces equals to this slot's number.

Advancing your tech dial allows you to replace the cards in your focus row with better versions that have special effects.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
1d9e37.name: Astrology

1de935.description:
[Industry]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number, or, if this card is in the fifth slot, your production equals 7.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 4 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

+1 Production for Wonders
1de935.name: Nationalism

2387dc.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

Once per turn, after you resolve the card in the fifth slot of your focus row, you may resolve it again, treating it as if it was in the first slot.
2387dc.name: Venetian Arsenal

258bb7.description:
[Military]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to 2 attacks within 3 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 1, or plus 3 if attacking a barbarian.

+1 to Combat Value
258bb7.name: Iron Working

25a74a.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Control tokens expand your territory, allowing you to acquire resources from the map and to mature your cities.

+1 Control Token
25a74a.name: Early Empire

26da8f.description: When you are building a wonder, reduce its cost by 1 for each of your mature cities.
26da8f.name: Brussels

2a7d89.description: When attacking a city or a city-state other than Kabul, increase your combat value by 3.
2a7d89.name: Kabul

2c9f26.description:
[Economy]

Move each of your caravans up to 6 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower, as well as water.

Once per turn, after you reset this card, choose another card in your focus row. Resolve that card as though it is in the first slot, but do not reset it.

+1 Space of Movement Each
2c9f26.name: Capitalism

2d5afb.description:
[Military]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to 2 attacks within 2 spaces of a friendly space. You combat value equals this slot's number.

A reinforced control token provides a defense bonus to its space and adjacent spaces. Attacking is an effective way to defeat barbarians, conquer city-states, and take control of rivals' world wonders.

+1 to Combat Value
2d5afb.name: Masonry

367e68.description:
[Economy]

Move each of your caravans up to 3 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Caravans travel to city-states and rival cities to gain trade tokens and diplomacy cards. Trade tokens increase a focus card's effect as descrived at the bottom of that card.

+1 Space of Movement Each
367e68.name: Foreign Trade

3805be.description: When you are placing control tokens, the difficulty of all terrain is reduced by 1.
3805be.name: Mohenjo Daro

39f2ee.description: When you are building a wonder, reduce its cost by 2 if you do not already have a wonder of its type.
39f2ee.name: Buenos Aires

3a2f94.description:
[Science]

If you resolved this card in the fifth slot, choose 1 space. In that space and all adjacent spaces, destroy all unreinforced control tokens and flip all reinforced control tokens to their unreinforced side.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
3a2f94.name: Nuclear Power

3b2931.description: When you move a caravan to the red player's capital (including the one used to take this card), place 1 trade token from the supply on a card in that player's focus row. Then, gain 1 resource of your choice from the supply.
3b2931.name: Embassy

3d576f.description:
[Science]

If you resolved this card in the fifth slot, choose 1 space. In that space and all adjacent spaces, destroy all unreinforced control tokens and flip all reinforced control tokens to their unreinforced side.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
3d576f.name: Nuclear Power

3ee748.description:
[Culture]

Place 3 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, choose a rival control token within 2 spaces of a friendly space. If the rival token is unreinforced, replace it with 1 of your control tokens on then unreinforced side. If the rival token is reinforced, flip it to its unreinforced side.

+1 Control Token
3ee748.name: Mass Media

3f01aa.description:
[Military]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to 2 attacks within 3 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 1, or plus 3 if attacking a barbarian.

+1 to Combat Value
3f01aa.name: Iron Working

3f5fd5.description:
[Military]

Perform up to 2 attacks within 3 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 2. You can count through water.

Then, reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number, minus 1 for each attack you performed.

+1 to Combat Value
3f5fd5.name: Mass Production

4160e6.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Control tokens expand your territory, allowing you to acquire resources from the map and to mature your cities.

+1 Control Token
4160e6.name: Early Empire

42a46a.description: The green player's control tokens contribute toward your cities' maturity.
42a46a.name: Open Borders

484c05.description:
There are three bags (each with four tiles) and four tiles in this bag.

Randomly select two City States and two Wonders. These tiles create the Core. The rest will be shuffled into bag "[Remaining]". 

Randomly deal one Capital tile and two remaining tiles to each player.
484c05.name: [Advanced map building]

4ebe78.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

When attacking or defending, increase your combat value by 2.
4ebe78.name: Alhambra

5237e0.description:
[Economy]

Move each of your caravans up to 6 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower, as well as water.

Once per turn, after you reset this card, choose another card in your focus row. Resolve that card as though it is in the first slot, but do not reset it.

+1 Space of Movement Each

Or, perform up to 3 attacks within 5 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 3. You can count through water, rival spaces, barbarians, and city-states.

+1 to Combat Value
5349ff.name: Flight

5366f8.description:
Teddy Roosevelt

[Roosevelt Corollary]

When you gain or spend a natural wonder token, place it on any card in your focus row.

You can spend a natural wonder token on a focus card either as a trade token on that card or as a resource.

Setup:
1. Masonry.
2. Astrology.
3. Pottery.
4. Early Empire.
5. Foreign Trade.
5366f8.name: America

53b9c4.description: When attacking, increase your combat value by 2 unless you are attacking the blue player.
53b9c4.name: Joint War

558b14.description:
[Industry]

Cleopatra

The cost of all world wonders is reduced by 1 for you.

5d00c8.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

At the start of your turn, you may swap 2 adjacent cards in your focus row.
5d00c8.name: Oracle

5f4489.description:
[Modern Wonder]

When attacking or defending, increase your combat value by 2 for each of your caravans adjacent to the defending space.
5f4489.name: Big Ben

62054a.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

When building cities, you can build in empty spaces on the edge of the map is if they were within 2 spaces of a friendly space.

64d15e.description: The orange player's control tokens contribute toward your cities' maturity.

Explorer:

776681.description: When attacking, increase your combat value by 2 unless you are attacking the red player.
776681.name: Joint War

78af68.description:
[Industry]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 5 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

+1 Production for Wonders
78af68.name: Urbanization

7d0ca4.description: When you are placing control tokens, the difficulty of all terrain is reduced by 1.
7d0ca4.name: Mohenjo Daro

81f6b5.description:
[Victory Card]

Warmonger:
 - Defeat 1 rival capital city or control 2 conquered city-states.

Paranoid:
 - Control 2 military world wonders.
81f6b5.name: Warmonger | Paranoid

826f77.description:
Montezuma

[Legend of the Five Suns]

After you reset your military focus card, if you won at least 1 attack this turn, you may swap any 2 cards in your focus row.

Setup:
1. Astrology.
2. Early Empire.
3. Foreign Trade.
4. Masonry.
5. Pottery.
826f77.name: Aztec

bbc9ed.description:
[Military]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to 3 attacks within 5 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 3. You can count through water, rival spaces, barbarians, and city-states.

+1 to Combat Value
bbc9ed.name: Flight

c03e5a.description:
[Science]

Place 1 trade token from the supply on 1 of your focus cards.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
c03e5a.name: Mathematics

c1ead7.description:
[Industry]

Build 1 world wonder. You production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal scpace of this slot's terrain or lower within 2 spaces of a friendly space.

World wonders grand powerful, unique effects to their owners. Cities expand a player's reach into new areas of the map and increase the number of world wonders he or she can have.

+1 Production for Wonders
c1ead7.name: Pottery

c39e80.description:
Gilgamesh

[Epic Quest]

When you defeat a barbarian, gain 1 resource of your choice from the supply (in addition to a trade token).

Setup:
1. Foreign Trade.
2. Early Empire.
3. Astrology.
4. Masonry.
5. Pottery.
c39e80.name: Sumeria

c4412b.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Control tokens expand your territory, allowing you to acquire resources from the map and to mature your cities.

+1 Control Token
c4412b.name: Early Empire

c6af75.description:
[Industry]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 3 spaces of a friendly space.

Or, build 1 city on an empty space of this slot's terrain or lower that is adjacent to a friendly caravan.

+1 Production for Wonders
c6af75.name: Animal Husbandry

c89543.description: When defending, increase your combat value by 2 unless the red player is attacking.
c89543.name: Defensive Pact

c939f3.description:
[Industry]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number, or, if this card is in the fifth slot, your production equals 7.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 4 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

+1 Production for Wonders
c939f3.name: Nationalism

c9b6f6.description: When defending, increase your combat value by 2 unless the green player is attacking.
c9b6f6.name: Defensive Pact

ca589a.description:
[Economy]

Move each of your caravans up to 6 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower, as well as water.

Then, you may exchange 1 of your resource tokens with another resource token of any type from the supply.

+1 Space of Movement Each
ca589a.name: Steam Power

cb85b9.description: The red player's control tokens contribute toward your cities' maturity.
cb85b9.name: Open Borders

cc3f9c.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

When resolving your economy focus card, your caravans can move a total of 6 additional spaces, divided as you choose.
cc3f9c.name: Colossus

cd7b6a.description:
[Science]

Gain 1 resource of your choice from the supply. You cannot gain a resource of a type that you already have.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
cd7b6a.name: Replaceable Parts

ce2434.description:
[Modern Wonder]

At the start of your turn, you may choose 2 rival control tokens on the map belonging to the same player. That player replaces 1 of those tokens with 1 of your unused, unreinforced control tokens.
ce2434.name: Eiffel Tower

d0640c.description:
[Economy]

Move each of your caravans up to 4 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Your caravans can move into barbarians' spaces. If you move a caravan into a barbarian's space, defeat that barbarian without gaining a trade token.

+1 Space of Movement Each
d0640c.name: Currency

d32521.description:
[Military]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to 2 attacks within 2 spaces of a friendly space. You combat value equals this slot's number.

A reinforced control token provides a defense bonus to its space and adjacent spaces. Attacking is an effective way to defeat barbarians, conquer city-states, and take control of rivals' world wonders.

+1 to Combat Value
d32521.name: Masonry

d6bc38.description:
[Modern Wonder]

When attacking a rival space, increase your combat value by 4 if you have more reinforced control tokens on the map than the defending player.
d6bc38.name: Kremlin

d74103.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

You can place trade tokens on this card instead of on your focus cards, up to a limit of 4.

At the start of your turn, you may move trade tokens from this card to cards in your focus row.
d74103.name: Great Zimbabwe

d85cc8.description:
Use the board tiles in this bag and the water hexes to create an advanced map.

Locations for these barbarians are on the B side of the tiles.

The B side can be found on State Two. DO NOT USE THE BACK OF THE TILES.
d85cc8.name: [Advanced map building]

dade18.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, you may move 1 of your control tokens to an adjacent, non-water space that is empty (does not contain a token or plasctic figure).

+1 Control Token
dade18.name: Drama and Poetry

dca469.description:
[Industry]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 5 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

Then, if you build a city, place up to 2 control tokens adjacent to that city. Those tokens can be placed on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

+1 Production for Wonders
dca469.name: Urbanization

ddab71.description:
[Economy]

Move each of your caravans up to 4 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Your caravans can move into barbarians' spaces. If you move a caravan into a barbarian's space, defeat that barbarian without gaining a trade token.

+1 Space of Movement Each
ddab71.name: Currency

e07ab9.description:
[Victory Card]

Civilized:
 - Have 8 of your cities on the map.

Money Grubber:
 - Control 2 economic world wonders.
e07ab9.name: Civilized | Money Grubber

e1607d.description:
[Modern Wonder]

When defending, increase you combat value by 5.
e1607d.name: Ruhr Valley

e25aa2.description: When attacking a city or a city-state other than Kabul, increase your combat value by 3.
e25aa2.name: Kabul

e2e073.description: When defending, increase your combat value by 2 unless the orange player is attacking.
e2e073.name: Defensive Pact

e58dac.description:
[Industry]

Build 1 world wonder. You production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal scpace of this slot's terrain or lower within 2 spaces of a friendly space.

World wonders grand powerful, unique effects to their owners. Cities expand a player's reach into new areas of the map and increase the number of world wonders he or she can have.

+1 Production for Wonders
e58dac.name: Pottery

e73a63.description:
[Victory Card]

Technophile:
 - Reach 24 on your tech dial.

Scholarly:
 - Control 2 scientific world wonders.
e73a63.name: Technophile | Scholarly

eb4369.description:
[Modern Wonder]

Rival control tokens contribute toward your cities' maturity.
eb4369.name: Sydney Opera House

ec9343.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

At the start of your turn, you may destroy 1 rival control token that is adjacent to a friendly space.
ec9343.name: Forbidden City

ee0ecc.description:
[Military]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to 2 attacks within 3 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 1, or plus 3 if attacking a barbarian.

+1 to Combat Value
ee0ecc.name: Iron Working

eeaf8f.description:
Tomyris

[People of the Steppe]

When attacking or defending grassland or hill space, increase your combat value by 3.

Setup:
1. Early Empire.
2. Masonry.
3. Astrology.
4. Foreign Trade.
5. Pottery.
eeaf8f.name: Scythia

efec19.description:
[Economy]

Move each of your caravans up to 6 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower, as well as water.

Then, you may exchange 1 of your resource tokens with another resource token of any type from the supply.

+1 Space of Movement Each
efec19.name: Steam Power

f05892.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

When you build this wonder, choose up to 3 level-I cards in your focus row. Replace each with a level-II card of the same type.
f05892.name: Pyramids

f0bee6.description: When you are resloving your industry or culture focus card, the terrain difficulty of forests is 1.
f0bee6.name: Kumasi

f52d7f.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, place 1 control token on a space matching this slot's terrain or lower that is adjacent to a friendly space.

+1 Control Token
f52d7f.name: Civil Service

f68f4c.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

At the start of your turn, you may place 1 control token on a space of terrain difficulty 4 or less that is adjacent to a friendly city.
f68f4c.name: Hanging Gardens

f8291f.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

When you resolve the card in the first or second slot of your focus row, you may treat it as being in the third slot of your row.
f8291f.name: Machu Picchu

f98449.description: At the start of your turn, you may move 1 barbarian to an adjacent, empty space.
f98449.name: Seoul

fa5d41.description:
[Culture]

Place 3 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, choose a rival control token within 2 spaces of a friendly space. If the rival token is unreinforced, replace it with 1 of your control tokens on then unreinforced side. If the rival token is reinforced, flip it to its unreinforced side.

+1 Control Token
fa5d41.name: Mass Media

fac552.description: At the start of your turn, you may return 1 diplomacy card you have taken from another player. If you do, choose and take a different diplomacy card from that player.
fac552.name: Geneva

fad788.description:
[Industry]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 5 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

Then, if you build a city, place up to 2 control tokens adjacent to that city. Those tokens can be placed on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

+1 Production for Wonders
fad788.name: Urbanization

faf174.description:
[Science]

Gain 1 resource of your choice from the supply. You cannot gain a resource of a type that you already have.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
faf174.name: Replaceable Parts

fcf9c4.description:
[Modern Wonder]

When you replace a focus card other than a science focus card, you do not have to replace it with a card of the same type.
fcf9c4.name: Oxford University

fddd6d.description:
[Science]

Advance your tech dial a number of spaces equals to this slot's number.

Advancing your tech dial allows you to replace the cards in your focus row with better versions that have special effects.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
fddd6d.name: Astrology

ff4988.description:
[Economy]

Move each of your caravans up to 6 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower, as well as water.

Once per turn, after you reset this card, choose another card in your focus row. Resolve that card as though it is in the first slot, but do not reset it.

+1 Space of Movement Each
ff4988.name: Capitalism

ffe8ca.description: When attacking, increase your combat value by 2 unless you are attacking the green player.
ffe8ca.name: Joint War
